verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein his <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H4033>stranger,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> being <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H251>brethren;<s%> and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> was <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wives:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H853>their<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report.<s%>

Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> more than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his old <S%H2208>age:<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors.<s%>

And when his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> him more than <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him, and <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> unto him.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and he <S%H5046>told<s%> it his <S%H251>brethren:<s%> and they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H3254>more.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have dreamed: <S%H2492><s%>

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> were <S%H481>binding<s%> <S%H485>sheaves<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> my <S%H485>sheaf<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> stood <S%H5324>upright;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H485>sheaves<s%> stood round <S%H5437>about,<s%> and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to my <S%H485>sheaf.<s%>

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Shalt thou indeed <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H4427><s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us? <S%H518>or<s%> shalt thou indeed have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> <S%H4910><s%> over us? And they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> it his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H5750>more;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to me.

And he <S%H5608>told<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H251>brethren:<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H2492>dreamed?<s%> Shall <S%H589>I<s%> and thy <S%H517>mother<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> indeed <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H935><s%> to bow down <S%H7812>ourselves<s%> to thee to the <S%H776>earth?<s%>
And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> him; but his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8104>observed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>saying.<s%>
And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>flock<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> Do <S%H3808>not<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> the flock in <S%H7927>Shechem?<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> thee <S%H413>unto<s%> them. And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1980>Go,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853>whether<s%> it be <S%H7965>well<s%> with thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H6629>flocks;<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> me <S%H1697>word<s%> again. So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him out of the <S%H4480>vale<s%> <S%H6010><s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And a certain <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> him, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H8582>wandering<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1245>seekest<s%> thou?

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H251>brethren:<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H375>where<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> their flocks.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> They are <S%H5265>departed<s%> <S%H4480>hence;<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> them <S%H559>say,<s%> Let us <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> them in <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%>

And when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him afar <S%H4480>off,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> even <S%H2962>before<s%> he came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, they <S%H5230>conspired<s%> against him to <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1976>this<s%> <S%H1167>dreamer<s%> <S%H2472><s%> <S%H935>cometh.<s%>

Come <S%H1980><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, and let us <S%H2026>slay<s%> him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> and we will <S%H559>say,<s%> Some <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> him: and we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> of his <S%H2472>dreams.<s%>
And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him out of their <S%H4480>hands;<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5221>kill<s%> him.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H8210>Shed<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> but <S%H7993>cast<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon him; <S%H4616>that<s%> he might <S%H5337>rid<s%> him out of their <S%H4480>hands,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H7725>deliver<s%> him <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> again.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> that they <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out <S%H853>of<s%> his <S%H3801>coat,<s%> <S%H853>his<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H5921>on<s%> him;
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into a <S%H953>pit:<s%> and the <S%H953>pit<s%> was <S%H7386>empty,<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in it.

And they sat <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H736>company<s%> of <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H4480>Gilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%> with their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H5219>spicery<s%> and <S%H6875>balm<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> to carry it <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H3680>conceal<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1818>blood?<s%>

Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us <S%H4376>sell<s%> him to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites,<s%> and let <S%H408>not<s%> our <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> upon him; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is our <S%H251>brother<s%> and our <S%H1320>flesh.<s%> And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> were <S%H8085>content.<s%>

Then there passed <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H376>Midianites<s%> <S%H4084><s%> <S%H5503>merchantmen;<s%> and they <S%H4900>drew<s%> and lifted <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> to the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H953>pit;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H369>not<s%> in the <S%H953>pit;<s%> and he <S%H7167>rent<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3206>child<s%> is <S%H369>not;<s%> and <S%H589>I,<s%> <S%H575>whither<s%> shall <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H935>go?<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3801>coat,<s%> and <S%H7819>killed<s%> a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood;<s%>

And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors,<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> it <S%H413>to<s%> their <S%H1>father;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> have we <S%H4672>found:<s%> <S%H5234>know<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> whether <S%H1931>it<s%> be thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H3808>no.<s%>

And he <S%H5234>knew<s%> it, and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3801>coat;<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> him; <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is without doubt rent in <S%H2963>pieces.<s%> <S%H2963><s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> upon his <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> him; but he <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> I will go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H7585>grave<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H57>mourning.<s%> Thus his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> for him.

And the <S%H4092>Midianites<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6318>Potiphar,<s%> an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's,<s%> and <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard.<s%>
